name: Unidentified_Zygerrian_scout
content:
A Zygerrian scout operated under the Zygerrian Slave Empire during the early days of the Imperial Era. The scout served under Raney in Old Ord Mantell City on Ord Mantell. After Jabba's pet rancor, Muchi, was kidnapped by the slavers, Cid sent out Clone Force 99 to rescue Muchi. The mission failed, as almost all of Clone Force 99 was captured, except for Omega. This scout was sent to check the Marauder for any living life forms, but Omega snuck through a shaft in the ship and hid behind some rocks. The scout and his cohort then reported that the ship was clear and sped back to base.
The Zygerrian scout appeared in "Rampage," the fifth episode of the series Star Wars: The Bad Batch, released on Disney+ on May 28, 2021. He was portrayed by Matthew Wood.
